description:
Kokonotsu Shikada is the son of a dagashi snack shop owner. Although he wants to become a manga artist, his father, Yo, wants him to take over the family business. One day, a girl named Hotaru Shidare shows up at the shop and challenges Kokonotsu.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Bâton des Délices et Potato Fry / Bonbon au café au lait et Young Doughnuts
